EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite! The Summit by NCS The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parent/Guardian,
We hope your young person enjoyed their experience on our NCS programme!
I am writing to inform you about our first exclusive graduate event taking place on the 28th November called Ignite! The Summit. It will be held at the University of West London - Ealing Campus and shall bring together 500 young people who have just completed NCS in West London. The Summit will give them an opportunity to learn about vital national and international campaigns and inspire them to take action.
Not only is it an opportunity for graduates to reunite with all their friends they made on the NCS Programme, it is also a chance to get involved in their community, discussing global issues and making a local impact. We will be holding numerous fun and interactive workshops which they can get involved in. These workshops focus on: poverty and conflict, climate change, HIV and Aids, refugees and migration and creative activism i.e. how NCS graduates can use their talents and interests to further social change.
Working alongside some major organisations, these workshops will enable young people to build their CV, improve their employability and express their talents.The day will end with a graduate party which will consist of a live band and a DJ, giving graduates the chance to catch up with all their friends and have an amazing time.
This is a one-off opportunity exclusive to NCS Grads, which your son/daughter would really benefit from, and I encourage you to help get them involved, as they won't want to miss out!
If you would like any further information, please visit our website at www.tcswestlondon.co.uk where tickets are available to order. Also do not hesitate to contact me with any questions or queries on ola.awosika@the-challenge.org
Kind Regards,
Ola Awosika
